sentences.en: An illustrative example is also given for demonstrating our proposed method.
sentences.cn: 文中并以一范例来说明整个决策方法的运作.

sentences.en: An illustrative example shows that the method has the practicability and maneuverability.
sentences.cn: 算例表明,该方法具有实用性和可操作性.

sentences.en: An illustrative example shows the effectiveness of the proposed design method.
sentences.cn: 数值例子说明了所给方法的有效性.

sentences.en: Finally, an illustrative example is given to show of the method.
sentences.cn: 最后通过案例分析,表明该方法具有实际应用价值.

sentences.en: For an illustrative purpose, four well - known problems are studied in this paper.
sentences.cn: 为了说明, 本文研究了四个著名的问题.

sentences.en: His illustrative examples are almost invariably warmed over from other writings.
sentences.cn: 他举的例子几乎全是从别的著作中借用的.

sentences.en: Illustrative sentence: Take an examination of English afternoon, we can golden triangle.
sentences.cn: 例句: 下午考英语, 我们又可以金三角了.

sentences.en: Note: Attached Bugatti renderings are for illustrative purposes only.
sentences.cn: 注: 附加布加迪渲染是仅用于说明的目的.

sentences.en: Obliques are suitable for illustrative, teaching and training purposes.
sentences.cn: 倾斜相片适宜于展览, 教学和训练之用.

sentences.en: Such a traditional division of the zone of aeration is useful for illustrative purposes.
sentences.cn: 为了说明的目的,包气带的传统划分是有用的.

sentences.en: The illustrations are strictly illustrative of the text.
sentences.cn: 这些插图是严格地解释正文内容的.
那些有关臭氧的条款都是说明性质的.

sentences.en: These figures have been chosen for illustrative purposes only.
sentences.cn: 选择这些数值仅是为了说明问题.

sentences.en: Thus, we shall obtain some illustrative material which will facilitate the understanding of the definition.
sentences.cn: 这样, 我们将得到某些说明性的资料,可以有助于理解此定义.

sentences.en: Try to sort out the basic principles from what is simply illustrative detail and digression.
sentences.cn: 试着从那些繁琐的、枝节的论述中把基本原理摘出来.

words.tran_cn: 插图画家；说明者；图解者
说明的；作例证的；解说的

trans.tran_en: helping to explain the meaning of something
